Term.Name: gain
Term.Definition: Multiplication factor of another channel. Constant value. As a Ratio.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: gainVar
Term.Definition: Multiplication factor of another channel. Variable. As a Ratio.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: phase
Term.Definition: Phase shift of another channel. Constant value. In Degrees.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: phaseVar
Term.Definition: Phase shift of another channel. Variable. In Degrees.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: delay
Term.Definition: Time delay of another channel. Constant value. In milliseconds.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: delayVar
Term.Definition: Time delay of another channel. Variable. In milliseconds.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: reference
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project
